mapper.select: SELECT cr.room_idx, -- 채팅방 ID CASE WHEN cr.create_user_idx = #{userIdx} THEN cr.invited_user_idx -- 상대방의 ID ELSE cr.create_user_idx END AS opponent_idx, -- 상대방 ID CASE WHEN cr.create_user_idx = #{userIdx} THEN u2.user_name -- 상대방 이름 ELSE u1.user_name END AS opponent_name, -- 상대방 이름 CASE WHEN cr.create_user_idx = #{userIdx} THEN u2.user_profile_url -- 상대방 프로필 URL ELSE u1.user_profile_url END AS opponent_profile_url, -- 상대방 프로필 URL cr.created_at -- 채팅방 생성 시간 FROM tb_chatRoomList cr JOIN tb_user u1 ON cr.create_user_idx = u1.user_idx JOIN tb_user u2 ON cr.invited_user_idx = u2.user_idx WHERE cr.create_user_idx = #{userIdx} OR cr.invited_user_idx = #{userIdx}

SELECT crd.message_idx, crd.room_idx, crd.sender_idx, crd.message, crd.sent_at, crd.image_url as image, u.user_profile_url as senderProfile FROM tb_chatRoomDetail crd JOIN tb_user u ON crd.sender_idx = u.user_idx WHERE crd.room_idx = #{roomIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_chatRoomDetail(sender_idx, message, sent_at, room_idx) VALUES( #{senderIdx}, #{message}, #{sentAt}, #{roomIdx} )
INSERT INTO tb_chatRoomDetail(room_idx, sender_idx, sent_at, image_url) VALUES (#{roomIdx}, #{senderIdx}, #{sentAt}, #{imageUrl})
